mapper.sql: a.id, a.factor_icon, a.factor_id, a.factor_name, a.node_id, a.offset, a.register_id, a.unit, a.alarm_delay, a.alarm_rate, a.coefficient, a.device_addr, a.digits, a.enabled, a.sort, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.status, d.block_id, b.name as block_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from device_factor a left join device d on a.device_addr = d.device_addr left join info_block b on d.block_id = b.id
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from device_factor a left join device d on a.device_addr = d.device_addr left join info_block b on d.block_id = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
